name: Ã Maurice Tasting Room
description: Estate and Walla Walla, Yakima, and Colombia grown grapes. Practices sustainable viticulture. This is one of my favorites!

name: Adams Bench Winery
description: Produces ~1,000 cases/year and focuses on Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet blends. It's a super small husband-and-wife duo and are a good fit for serious red wine lovers who want to find the places no one is talking about.

name: Pepper Bridge/Amavi Cellars
description: Amavi was one of our favorites in Walla Walla and they have a tasting room in Woodinville with their sister winery, Pepper Bridge.
